module.name: Languages
module.description: Adds the ability to changes the language within a call flow and add language attribute to users.
module.changelog: *13.0.6.5* FREEI-922 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *13.0.6.4* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *13.0.6.3* FREEPBX-18338 Languages module allows to create duplicate entries with same Description. *13.0.6.2* FREEPBX-17352 Call Asterisk Manager correctly *13.0.7* FREEPBX-13618 write out default language from user if device is of type fixed *13.0.6* FREEPBX-11903 Add bulkhandler hook *13.0.5* Slideout menu *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10320 *13.0.3* Use languages from Sound Languages module, if enabled *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *2.11.0.2* Include license file *2.11.0.1* Database abstraction fixes *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* #5312, #5313 *2.9.0.2* #4914 *2.9.0.1* set repository *2.9.0.0* #4657, #4655
